name: I. Zero point
description:
It seems to me, that to fully explain what Bezmiar is, we have to travel back at the very beginning. To the moment where nothing existed except one single point.
Comprehension of this matter will be difficult because our world wasn’t always threedimensional. As a matter of fact in the beginning there wasnt any dimension at all.
So, at the beginning there was a point. According to Euclid point is „something that which has no part”. Truthfully we dont know what it was or how the first dimension started, our very existence in many dimensions prevents us from understanding.
But as far as I know my friend, your scientists also disagree about how your world began. Therefore - to facilitate our communication - I decided to present the whole story using two dimensions.
